title: Snow day! The art of Snowdown

replies.body: I don't know if I'm the only one but I would totally have chosen the D model for Snowday Syndra
I would've picked C
C is good to I do feel that the hat and earmuffs were a bit overkill

But {{champion:134}} is all about 'overkill,' her kit, her ulti, her personality.
So, overkill **is** the way to go with her. Even when she's out playing in the snow, she'd still be the one to overdo it and go full tryhad mode, build epic snow fort, have an 'ammo' stock of snowballs, full overdressed snowgear-"armor", etc.
why A!!!! B,C,D all feel much better!
I like C as well, both the hair and the lack of earmuffs. Not sure why they made her blonde, either.

Honestly the current skin is the best in my opinion. I think it's a really interesting skin for syndra, "MASTER OF POWERRRRRRRRR", to have. It shows a side of her that, in all honesty, I'm pretty sure doesnt actually exist. It's cool to see hyper-gritty, edgy champs get a less than serious skin, and I think syndra's skin fills a beautiful niche that gives you a glimpse of her that you would otherwise never even think about. And while her skin isn't a silly take on a serious champ, it's kind of nice to see something done with a champ that's not just a cop-out polar opposite take, kind of like watching an episode of a show where they give you the heartbreaking backstory of the villain!

I agree with you there. I'm a huge Syndra fan. So any skin for her I will most likely love. But i would like to add something atop your excellent point. I actually think that "A" was the best choice. The Snowdown skins are fun, most of them are really upbeat and filled with that "day off" feeling. For Syndra however, there is this feeling and look of "Yea, I'm outside but I'm really cold and people keep throwing snowballs at me." I love these skins and I'm really happy that they included Syndra. Not surprised as she throws balls of death literally. But happy none the less.
Yes my brother. D is da best
Completely agree with you. D is much more cooler. Even adding some of C's design would've made it epic.
Will agree C or D I like over the current model, but mainly the splash art for her made me go eh on her model I think if you take a bit from each drawing together you could make a cool skin

Ikr. Would have been better if they were made poros. :D I would totally go for that, like I would spend ALOT of money on that.

Ye but I cant help thinking it wouldve been nicer if they were poros... I mean cmon...

For me an army of Poro Meeps would have been the only thing more awesome than the penguin army....
